## Content Checklist
- [ ] My article follows the **TWMP Writing Style Guide**.
- [ ] I have used **they/them** pronouns throughout.
- [ ] All headings are in **Sentence case**.
- [ ] I have included a **frontmatter** block at the top of the Markdown file.
- [ ] All images have **Alt-text** and fig caption and are saved in the correct folder.

## Technical Checklist
- [ ] My filename is in **kebab-case.mdx**.
- [ ] The code blocks have the correct language tags (e.g., ```javascript).
